entry.title: Saturday: Chance of wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of wet flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Snow level rising to 2000 metres in the afternoon.
